pages.text: The Mimic Octopus can be bound in warm oceans and coral reefs. They are neutral creatures.$(br2)They have the hability to camouflage into their surrounding, changing their skin colour.$(br2)While they are not in camouflage state, they can be tamed with Lobster Tails.
Tamed Mimic Octopus can be commanded to stay, follow, and wander.

Tamed Mimic Octopus can walk on land if tame too but only 5 minutes out of water.$(br2)This can be circumvented by giving them slime balls, which will allow them to last longet out of water.$(br2)If you right click a tame Mimic Octopus with an Ink Sack, It will stop chaning colours to camouflage it's self.

You can also use prismarine shards, pupperfish or gunpowder on it, which will cause it to change it to change it's look ro rememble a guardian, a pupperfish or a creeper respectively.$(br2)If fed a few mimicream, it will actually learn how to mimic the attacks of the mobs  allowing it to shoot lasers as a guardian, poison mobs as a pufferfish, and create small explosions as a creeper, which will not kill it. On death it may drop a Ink Sac.
